Class ExtensionUtils

java.lang.Object
ca.phon.extensions.ExtensionUtils
public class ExtensionUtils
extends java.lang.Object
Utility methods for working with extensions.

      public static boolean isExtendable​(java.lang.Object obj)

      ext -
      Returns:

    • getExtension

      public static <T> T getExtension​(java.lang.Object obj, java.lang.Class<T> ext)
      Get the specified extension if it exists
      Parameters:
      obj -
      ext -
      Returns:
      the specified extension or null if the extension is not available or the object is not extendable

    • putExtension

      Parameters:

      ext -
      extObj -
      Returns:
